HediffDef.label: total artificial heart
HediffDef.description: A prosthetic heart. Made of flexible materials and an electric pump, it works for keeping blood pumping through the body, but doesn't do it well.

HediffDef.label: ECMO pump
HediffDef.description: A prosthetic lung. Blood is filtered into the machine which is fitted onto the back. The machine then oxygenates the blood and pumps it back into the body. Stands for Extracorporeal Membrane Oxygenation.

HediffDef.label: renal dialysis machine
HediffDef.description: A prosthetic kidney. Fitted outside the body, it uses hemodialysis to simulate kidney functions and remove toxins from the blood. Waste is then expelled from a tube.

HediffDef.label: MARS dialysis machine
HediffDef.description: A prosthetic liver. Fitted outside the body, it uses two different dialysis methods to simulate liver function and remove toxins from the blood. Waste is then expelled from a tube. Stands for Molecular Adsorbents Recirculating System.
